title: 26 of 2013) (the "Act"), the Bank, having consulted the Minister for Finance and
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Central Bank (Supervision and
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Central Bank (Supervision and 
Enforcement) Act 2013 (Section 48(1)) (Investment Firms) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2022. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 21 February 2022 .
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited central bank (supervision enforcement) act 2013 (section 48(1)) (investment firms) (amendment) regulation 2022 (2) regulation come operation 21 february 2022

title: 26 of 2013) (the "Act"), the Bank, having consulted the Minister for Finance and
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Central Bank
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Central Bank 
(Supervision and Enforcement) Act 2013 (Section 48(1)) (Investment Firms) 
Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 604 of 2017).
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean central bank (supervision enforcement) act 2013 (section 48(1)) (investment firms) regulation 2017 (s.i no 604 2017)

title: 26 of 2013) (the "Act"), the Bank, having consulted the Minister for Finance and
heading: 3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations are amended by inserting
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations are amended by inserting 

the following definition before the definition of “investment fund”: 

“‘Investment Firm Regulation’ means Regulation (EU) 2019/2033 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 27 November 2019 on the prudential 
requirements of investment firms and amending Regulations (EU) No 
1093/2010, (EU) No 575/2013, (EU) No 600/2014 and (EU) No 806/2014.
text_norm: 3 regulation 2(1) principal regulation amended inserting following definition definition investment fund investment firm regulation mean regulation (eu) 2019 2033 european parliament council 27 november 2019 prudential requirement investment firm amending regulation (eu) 1093 2010 (eu) 575 2013 (eu) 600 2014 (eu) 806 2014

title: 26 of 2013) (the "Act"), the Bank, having consulted the Minister for Finance and
heading: 4. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for Regulation 8
text_raw:
4. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for Regulation 8 

the following Regulation: 

“8. (1) In this Regulation “data item” means an account, record, report, return or 
other information referred to in column 1 of each of the Parts of the Schedule; 

(2) A fund administrator shall submit to the Bank all data items specified— 

(a) 

in Part 1 of the Schedule, and 

(b) on the Online Reporting System in respect of the fund 

administrator. 

(3) An investment business firm who is not a fund administrator shall submit 

to the Bank all data items specified— 

(a) 

in Part 2 of the Schedule, and 

(b) on the Online Reporting System in respect of the investment 

business firm. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th February, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [45] 3 

(4) A MiFID investment firm which meets the criteria set out in Articles 1(2) 
of the Investment Firm Regulation or has been granted a derogation under 1(5) 
of the Investment Firm Regulation (a Class 1 minus firm) shall submit to the 
Bank all data items specified— 

(a) 

in Part 3 of the Schedule, and 

(b) on the Online Reporting System in respect of the MiFID 

investment firm. 

(5) A MiFID investment firm which does not meet either the criteria set out 
in Articles 1(2) or the criteria set out in Article 12(1) of the Investment Firm 
Regulation and has not been granted a derogation under 1(5) of the Investment 
Firm Regulation (a Class 2 firm) shall submit to the Bank all data items 
specified— 

(a) 

in Part 4 of the Schedule, and 

(b) on the Online Reporting System in respect of the MiFID 

investment firm. 

(6) A MiFID investment firm which meets all the conditions set out in 
Article 12 of the Investment Firm Regulation (a Class 3 firm) shall submit to the 
Bank all data items specified— 

(a) 

in Part 5 of the Schedule, and 

(b) on the Online Reporting System in respect of the MiFID 

investment firm.”

2 In situations where Class 1 minus firms are permitted by national laws to report their financial 
information based on their accounting year-end, which deviates from the calendar year, reporting 
reference dates should be adjusted accordingly, so that reporting of financial information is done 
every 3, 6 or 12 months from their accounting year-end, respectively.

title: 26 of 2013) (the "Act"), the Bank, having consulted the Minister for Finance and
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to amend the Central Bank (Supervision and 
Enforcement) Act 2013 (Section 48(1)) (Investment Firms) Regulations 2017 
(S.I. No. 604 of 2017). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [45] 11
